refnamediv.refpurpose: a C enumeration which defines the types available for a variable

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A C enumeration which defines the types available for a variable. You must include stack-c.h to benefit from this type definition.
The list of available types is the following:

listitem.para: 14 - sci_lib: a library of Scilab functions

refsection.para: Integers or enumeration types can be used to check the type of the variables. Using the enumeration type is recommended because of the explicit meaning of the value of the enumeration type.
If this function is used, it is probable that GetType will also be used.

refsection.title: Examples
